newsitem.title: UK: Morgan Stanley prices three-tranche stg bond.
newsitem.headline: Morgan Stanley prices three-tranche stg bond.

text.p: Residential Mortgages No.2 Plc has priced a three-tranche floating-rate note lead manager Morgan Stanley said.
Class A notes total 46.1 million stg, class B notes 2.48 million stg and class M notes total 4.11 million stg.
AMT 46.1 MLN STG BASE *3M LIBOR EXP MAT 15.SEP.07
TYPE FRN MARGIN +15 BP LEG MAT 2037
FULL FEES 0.225 ISS/REOFF PAR EXP LIFE 4.1 YRS
PAY DATE 29.MAY.97 LISTING LONDON PAY FREQ QUARTERLY
NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT NO FORCE MAJ IPMA 2
GOV LAW ENGLISH HOME CTRY = TAX PROVS STANDARD
NOTES *IF NOT REDEEMED AT EXPECTED MATURITY THEN STEPS-UP
